Row.Text: Welcome to Sweden. I am the Prime Minister, Olof Palme. For us, democracy is a measure of human dignity; are you yourselves democratic, or are you so undignified as to treat your people like cattle? Only time will tell.
My Folkhemmet is no more. While you govern with an iron fist, I will challenge your rule in the streets.
You have attacked a free and welcoming people. Your nation cannot be reformed; it has to be eliminated.
As a fellow guardian of social democracy, I feel obliged to extent a hand of friendship. Will you help me to protect the world?

You are a dictator and an aggressor. Walking down the road to war will result in your overthrow by the people.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

I had mistaken you for a friend in preserving social liberties. I can see now that these liberties can only be achieved with your end.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
My military might may be humble combared to your brute armies, but my navy will get the better of you. I resisted taking sides before, but I will summon all the lesser evils against you.
If our democratic socialist way of life makes us an enemy, so be it.
